page.title: 14GT. WAKERINGS COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: THE CENTRE OF THESE COMMUCATIONS IS THE POST OFFICE AND THERE ARE TWO OF THESE IN OUT AREA. ONE IS SITUATED IN THE HIGH STREET, GREAT WAKERING AND THE OTHER IN LITTLE WAKERING.THE POST OFFICE DEALS WITH LETTERS AND PARCELS AND SELLS STAMPS AND PAYS OUT PENSIONS AND ALLOWANCES. IT IS ALSO AN OUTLET FOR THE NATIONAL GIRO BANK. THE POST OFFICE IS OPEN FROM 9 A.M. UNTIL 5.30 P.M. EXCEPT ON A WEDNESDAY AND A SATURDAY WHEN IT CLOSES AT 1 P.M. THE POST OFFICE IN GREAT WAKERING ALSO SELLS SWEETS, BIRTHDAY AND GREETINGS CARDS AND STATIONARY. THE BUSIEST DAY OF THE WEEK IS A TUESDAY WHEN THE OLD AGE PENSIONS ARE PAID OUT AND THERE IS OFTEN A QUEUE EVEN BEFORE IT OPENS IN THE MORNING. THE POST OFFICE IS VERY IMPORTANT TO THE PEOPLE OF THE AREA ESPECIALLY THE OLD AS THEY NEED TO BE ABLE TO REACH IT EASILY.
